resources.string: Truevalue Rental is one of the leading vehicle rental companies in Nepal. We aim to keep things quick and easy for our customers while offering great every-day low prices car rental. So whether you're looking for a family rental, an eco-friendly vehicle or a bus hire, pay us a visit at rental station and enjoy fast and friendly service. The Green Program Here at Truevalue Renal, we believe whatâ€™s good for the Earth is good for our drivers. That's why we work hard to understand the environmental impact of what we do.
